sentences.sContent: Arcane nullifiers recognize Common, but only an experienced tinker, shouting out the correct codes, may command them.
sentences.sContent_eng: Arcane nullifiers recognize Common, but only an experienced tinker, shouting out the correct codes, may command them.
sentences.sCn: 虽然奥术消除者被认可为是公民，但只要是一名经验丰富的修补匠，高喊出正确的指令，就可以命令它们。

synos.tran: 做焊锅匠；焊补；笨手笨脚地做事

remMethod.val: 认真考虑考虑(think)， 你真的要做补锅匠(tinker)吗

trans.tranOther: in the past, a tinker was someone who travelled from place to place selling things or repairing metal pots, pans etc
